name: DigitalOcean
description: Download file or folder content of DigitalOcean Spaces Bucket
author: Marcelo Forment√£o

inputs.name: digitalCredentials
inputs.label: DigitalOcean Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select the service endpoint for your DigitalOcean connection.
To create one, click the Manage link and create a new service endpoint based on AWS configuration.

inputs.name: digitalRegion
inputs.label: DigitalOcean Region
inputs.helpMarkDown: The DigitalOcean datacenter region code (nyc3, ams3, sgp1, etc.) of the region containing the Spaces resource(s) the task will use.

inputs.name: digitalBucket
inputs.label: Bucket Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the bucket where the content will be downloaded.

inputs.name: digitalGlobExpressions
inputs.label: Filename Patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Glob patterns to select the file and folder content to be downloaded.
Supports multiple lines of minimatch patterns and also exclude patterns.

inputs.name: digitalSourceFolder
inputs.label: Source Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The source folder (referred to as a key prefix in Spaces) that the content pattern(s) will be run against.
If not set the root of the work area is assumed

inputs.name: digitalTargetFolder
inputs.label: Target Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The target folder on your build host to contain the downloaded content. You can use [variables](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988).

inputs.name: digitalFlattenFolders
inputs.label: Flatten Folders
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flatten the folder structure and download all files into the specified target folder.

inputs.name: digitalOverwrite
inputs.label: Overwrite
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable to replace existing files in target folder. An error is thrown if it tries to replace existing files with overwrite disabled.

inputs.name: digitalQueueConcurrency
inputs.label: Concurrency limit
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify how many files to download simultaneously.

inputs.name: digitalRetryFailed
inputs.label: Retry failed limit
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify how many times to retry a failed download.

messages.StartDownloadFiles: Downloading files from %s to %s in bucket %s
messages.FileOverwriteAlert: File %s already exists for key %s, it will be overwriten
messages.FileOverwriteError: File %s already exists for key %s, overwrite option is setted to not allow
messages.SearchingFiles: Searching '%s' prefix for files to delete
